page.description: Export a google document to a specified format.
page.prototype: ExportFile as L(id as C,mimeType as C)

argument.name: id
argument.description: Id of file to get (content returned in the response object.)

argument.name: mimeType
argument.description: Format that we want document returned in.

return.name: result
return.description: True if file was successfully exported from google drive.
